title: Frontend Developer
description: Build user-friendly React.js interfaces with responsive design. Work closely with the design team to create seamless user experiences using Material UI.

title: Java Backend Developer
description: Develop RESTful APIs using Spring Boot and manage database interactions with JPA and Hibernate. Experience in building scalable backend systems is a must.

title: Full Stack Engineer
description: Work on both frontend and backend with React and Spring Boot. Design and implement robust, high-performing web applications.

title: DevOps Engineer
description: Set up CI/CD pipelines using Jenkins and GitHub Actions. Manage infrastructure using Terraform and AWS services.

title: UI/UX Designer
description: Design modern interfaces and user flows. Collaborate with developers to implement responsive and accessible UI components.

title: Data Analyst
description: Analyze datasets to derive business insights. Create dashboards and reports using tools like Power BI or Tableau.

title: Product Manager
description: Lead product roadmap and delivery. Work with cross-functional teams to define features and prioritize backlogs.

title: Mobile App Developer
description: Develop Android and iOS apps using Flutter or React Native. Ensure performance, quality, and responsiveness of applications.

title: QA Engineer
description: Design test plans, scenarios, scripts, and procedures. Work with developers to resolve bugs and improve application quality.

title: Machine Learning Engineer
description: Build and deploy ML models. Experience in Python, TensorFlow/PyTorch, and model optimization techniques is required.

title: Database Administrator
description: Manage MySQL/PostgreSQL databases. Perform backups, recoveries, and optimizations.

title: Technical Writer
description: Create and maintain technical documentation for software products. Translate complex concepts into simple instructions.

title: System Administrator
description: Manage internal IT infrastructure, troubleshoot system issues, and ensure network security and uptime.

title: Security Analyst
description: Monitor, detect, and respond to security incidents. Perform regular audits and vulnerability assessments.

title: Business Analyst
description: Analyze business needs and recommend solutions. Gather requirements and prepare detailed documentation.
